meanings.sent1: The shrillness of the whistle hurt my ears.
meanings.sent2: Her voice had a noticeable shrillness when she was excited.
meanings.sent3: The shrillness of the alarm clock made me jump out of bed.
meanings.sent4: The shrillness of the wind through the trees sounded like a banshee's cry.
meanings.sent5: The shrillness of the baby's cry echoed through the house.

meanings.definition: The quality of being loud and harsh.
meanings.sent1: The shrillness of his criticism made me feel small.
meanings.sent2: The shrillness of the argument could be heard from across the street.
meanings.sent3: The shrillness of the teacher's reprimand startled the students.
meanings.sent4: The shrillness of the car alarm woke up the entire neighborhood.
meanings.sent5: The shrillness of the metal scraping against metal was unbearable.
